TextView.android:text: 18 Pull Ups
x4 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 High Chin Ups ---> 5 Chin Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Pull Up + 30.30.30. Isometric Hold
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 10kg Dips
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Straight Bar Dips ---> Max 10kg Wide Push Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
8-10x 75kg Squats
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20x 50kg Squats ---> 15x 20kg Lunges (E/S)
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 40kg One-Legged calf Raises ---> 30 One-Legged Calf Raises
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10-15 seconds Front Lever Tuck Hold ---> 10-15 seconds Back Lever Tuck Hold
x5-7 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups ---> 10 Pull Ups (r) ---> 10 Pull Ups (p)
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30.30.30. Isometric Hold with 5kg (Chin Up Grip)
x4-5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pike Push Ups ---> 10x 10kg Russian Push Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15 Dips +15.15.15. Iosmetric Hold
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max L-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Bar Leg Raises ---> 10 Bar Knee Raises
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
Optional: 20 Back Extensions ---> Max Front Lever Tuck Hold (5 sets, 2 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 60kg Squats ---> 20x 10kg Jumping Squats
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20x 50kg Squat ---> 1 min Wall Sit with 20kg
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30 Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S)
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Optional: 20x 10kg Sit Ups ---> 20x 10kg Roman Twists ---> 1 min Hollow Hold with 10kg
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 5 - Week 4
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
Do not progress to Week 5 until you can achieve one set of 18 pull ups without letting go off the bar.
